fields.description: Does the resource fit the mPowering remit of reproductive, maternal, newborn and child health (incl. nutrition and WASH)?
fields.description_en: Does the resource fit the mPowering remit of reproductive, maternal, newborn and child health (incl. nutrition and WASH)?

fields.description: Is the resource released under an open license (Creative Commons or public domain)?
fields.description_en: Is the resource released under an open license (Creative Commons or public domain)?

fields.description: Is the resource suitable for the intended mobile delivery method/device?
fields.description_en: Is the resource suitable for the intended mobile delivery method/device?

fields.description: Is the content relevant and likely to be useful for FLHWs based in low-resource settings?
fields.description_en: Is the content relevant and likely to be useful for FLHWs based in low-resource settings?

fields.description: Does the resource have clear learning objectives?
fields.description_en: Does the resource have clear learning objectives?

fields.description: Is the resource likely to help improve FLHW performance?
fields.description_en: Is the resource likely to help improve FLHW performance?

fields.description: Is the information clear, correct and authentic?
fields.description_en: Is the information clear, correct and authentic?

fields.description: Has the video been filmed in a context that feels authentic to users in low-resource settings?
fields.description_en: Has the video been filmed in a context that feels authentic to users in low-resource settings?

fields.description: Can FLHWs identify with the providers and patients in the video?
fields.description_en: Can FLHWs identify with the providers and patients in the video?

fields.description: Are images clear, with sufficient lighting, focused, well-conceived, no fast cuts and no distracting special effects/graphics?
fields.description_en: Are images clear, with sufficient lighting, focused, well-conceived, no fast cuts and no distracting special effects/graphics?

fields.description: Is the animation set in a context that FLHWs in low-resource setting can identify with?
fields.description_en: Is the animation set in a context that FLHWs in low-resource setting can identify with?

fields.description: Is the audio likely to feel authentic to FLHWs in low-resource settings?
fields.description_en: Is the audio likely to feel authentic to FLHWs in low-resource settings?

fields.description: Is the audio clear to hear and understand (speed, easy to follow)?
fields.description_en: Is the audio clear to hear and understand (speed, easy to follow)?

fields.description: Is the resource written in clear, easy to understand language?
fields.description_en: Is the resource written in clear, easy to understand language?

fields.description: Is the resource well designed (clear structure, layout, font, and colour scheme)?
fields.description_en: Is the resource well designed (clear structure, layout, font, and colour scheme)?

fields.description: Are any images easy to view and comprehensible on the intended delivery device?
fields.description_en: Are any images easy to view and comprehensible on the intended delivery device?

fields.description: Does the resource reflect current medical guidelines and best practice?
fields.description_en: Does the resource reflect current medical guidelines and best practice?
